[Verse 2] ------------------------------------------- [D] [G] Galin gala hepi pena keti visirenu dekala [Em] [C] [A7] [D] Nim nowu sithe sathutin hasarel pipila // [Bm] [G] Mathakaya mage... awadi wune... [A] [C] [A] [D] E edaya me medaya mata hithaganna nodi
